verbs.description: There [V: is] [ARG1: no group more responsible for Donald J. Trump than white evangelicals , who have fooled themselves into believing it 's God 's will] .
There is no group more responsible for Donald J. Trump than white evangelicals , who [V: have] fooled themselves into believing it 's God 's will .
There is no group more responsible for Donald J. Trump than [ARG0: white evangelicals] , [R-ARG0: who] have [V: fooled] [ARG1: themselves] [ARG2: into believing it 's God 's will] .
There is no group more responsible for Donald J. Trump than white evangelicals , who have fooled themselves into [V: believing] [ARG1: it 's God 's will] .
There is no group more responsible for Donald J. Trump than white evangelicals , who have fooled themselves into believing [ARG1: it] [V: 's] [ARG2: God 's will] .
